name: Patient Appointment
query:
SELECT
    `name` AS "Appointment ID:Link/Patient Appointment:150",
    `patient_id` AS "Patient ID:Data:120",
    `patient_name` AS "Patient Name:Data:150",
    `age` AS "Age:Int:50",
    `weight` AS "Weight:Float:50",
    `payment` AS "Payment Amount:Currency:100",
    `status` AS "Status:Select:100",
    `phone_number` AS "Phone Number:Data:120",
    `email` AS "Email:Data:150",
    `doctor_name` AS "Doctor Name:Data:150",
    `appointment_date` AS "Appointment Date:Date:120",
    `appointment_time` AS "Appointment Time:Time:100"
FROM
    `tabPatient Appointment`
ORDER BY
    `appointment_date` DESC, `appointment_time` ASC;
